predicate.note: Frames file for 'airlift' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'transfer'.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Tiger itself was founded [*-1] by a band of gungho airmen who [*T*-2] had airlifted supplies `` over the Hump '' from India to China during World War II .

example.name: without Arg3
example.text: Rebel artillerists bombarded the capital of Afghanistan , [*-2] killing at least 12 people , as the Soviet Union was reported [*-1] to be airlifting arms and food to Kabul 's forces .
